home.title: Your Library
home.emptyDescription: Search for artists or albums to start building your collection.

clearModal.title: Clear completed playlists?
clearModal.description: This will remove all completed playlists from your library. Downloaded files will NOT be deleted.

releases.title: Releases
releases.emptyDescription: No recent releases found from your followed artists.

myPlaylists.title: My Spotify Playlists
myPlaylists.error: Failed to load your playlists from Spotify.

playlist.emptyTracksTitle: No tracks in this playlist yet
playlist.emptyTracksDescription: Tracks you download or sync will appear here.

deleteModal.title: Delete {{name}}?
deleteModal.description: This will remove the playlist from your library. Downloaded files will NOT be deleted.

artist.emptyTracksDescription: This artist has no popular tracks available.

discography.title: Discography
discography.emptyFiltered: No releases found for this category.

auth.title: Spotify Authentication
auth.connectedDescription: You're connected to Spotify. This allows access to your playlists and Spotify-created playlists.
auth.disconnectedDescription: Connect your Spotify account to access your personal playlists and Spotify-created playlists (like 'Made For You').

benefits.personal: Import your personal and collaborative playlists
benefits.sync: Sync your followed artists for new releases

settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Select your preferred language for the interface.

UI_LANGUAGE.label: Interface Language
UI_LANGUAGE.description: Select your preferred language for the interface.

SPOTIFY_MARKET.label: Spotify Market/Region
SPOTIFY_MARKET.description: 2-letter ISO country code that affects content availability and regional restrictions. Change this to match your location for better results.

AUTO_SUBSCRIBE_NEW_PLAYLISTS.label: Automatically subscribe to new playlists
AUTO_SUBSCRIBE_NEW_PLAYLISTS.description: When enabled, new playlists are automatically subscribed. If disabled, you'll need to manually subscribe to them.

PLAYLIST_CHECK_INTERVAL_MINUTES.label: Playlist check interval (minutes)
PLAYLIST_CHECK_INTERVAL_MINUTES.description: How often SpotiArr should re-check subscribed playlists on Spotify for new tracks. Lower values increase API usage.

M3U_GENERATION_ENABLED.label: Automatically generate M3U playlists
M3U_GENERATION_ENABLED.description: When enabled, an M3U file will be created/updated for each completed playlist.

RELEASES_LOOKBACK_DAYS.label: New releases lookback period (days)
RELEASES_LOOKBACK_DAYS.description: How far back to look for new releases.

FOLLOWED_ARTISTS_MAX.label: Maximum followed artists
FOLLOWED_ARTISTS_MAX.description: Maximum number of followed artists to consider across releases and artists views. Higher values may slow down the releases feed and increase API usage.

RELEASES_CACHE_MINUTES.label: Cache duration (minutes)
RELEASES_CACHE_MINUTES.description: How long to cache releases data before refreshing from Spotify. Lower values increase API usage.

FORMAT.label: Audio format
FORMAT.description: The audio format for downloaded tracks.

YT_AUDIO_QUALITY.label: YouTube audio quality
YT_AUDIO_QUALITY.description: Audio quality preference for YouTube downloads. 'best' for highest quality, 'good' for balanced, 'acceptable' for faster downloads.

YT_COOKIES.label: YouTube cookies browser (optional)
YT_COOKIES.description: Browser to extract cookies from for age-restricted content (e.g., 'chrome', 'firefox', 'edge'). Leave empty if not needed.

YT_SEARCH_CONCURRENCY.label: YouTube search concurrency
YT_SEARCH_CONCURRENCY.description: Number of simultaneous YouTube searches. Higher values are faster but may trigger rate limits.

YT_DOWNLOADS_PER_MINUTE.label: YouTube downloads per minute
YT_DOWNLOADS_PER_MINUTE.description: Maximum number of downloads that can start per minute to avoid YouTube throttling.

DOWNLOAD_MAX_RETRIES.label: Maximum download retries
DOWNLOAD_MAX_RETRIES.description: How many times to retry a failed download before giving up.

STUCK_TRACKS_CLEANUP_INTERVAL_MINUTES.label: Stuck tracks cleanup interval (minutes)
STUCK_TRACKS_CLEANUP_INTERVAL_MINUTES.description: How often to check for and clean up stuck tracks.

STUCK_TRACKS_TIMEOUT_MINUTES.label: Stuck tracks timeout (minutes)
STUCK_TRACKS_TIMEOUT_MINUTES.description: How long before a track is considered stuck and eligible for cleanup.
